Name: War Room
RebelAction: Prevent all {^Strength} gain from non-plots for the rest of the turn

Name: Tactics Room
Passive: Adds 1 to all positive Basic {^Strength} cards
RebelAction: Triple the next {^Strength} loss this turn

Name: Orbital Cannon Controls
Passive: Adds 1 to all negative Basic {^Strength} cards (e.g. -2 becomes -1)
Action: Prevent all {^Strength} loss from non-plots for the rest of the turn

Action: Triple the next {^Strength} gain this turn
